mapper.select: SELECT u.user_no, u.user_name, u.user_email, u.user_status, u.user_images, u.user_bank, u.user_accountnum, p.pro_no, p.user_no, p.pro_title, p.pro_category, p.pro_start, p.pro_end, p.pro_goalprice, p.pro_ticketprice, p.pro_repimage, p.pro_images, p.pro_ongoing, p.pro_achieveprice FROM user u, project p WHERE u.user_no = p.user_no AND p.pro_no = ${pro_no};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment (user_no, pro_no, pay_date, pay_price, pay_merchantuid) VALUES (${user_no}, ${pro_no}, now(), ${pay_price}, ${pay_merchantuid})
